code: export var SAVE_TESTIMONIAL='SAVE_TESTIMONIAL';export var SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_SUCCESS='SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_SUCCESS';export var SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_FAIL='SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_FAIL';export var SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_RESET='SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_RESET';export var saveTestimonial=function saveTestimonial(params){return{type:SAVE_TESTIMONIAL,params:params};};export var saveTestimonialSuccess=function saveTestimonialSuccess(response){return{type:SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var saveTestimonialFail=function saveTestimonialFail(response){return{type:SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_FAIL,response:response};};export var saveTestimonialReset=function saveTestimonialReset(){return{type:SAVE_TESTIMONIAL_RESET};};
